{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"1","subject":"Reconcile DSPy architecture in agent-implementation-builder","description":"Update the agent-implementation-builder skill to align with prompt-engineering's DSPy pattern (separate .md prompt files loaded at runtime via __doc__ reassignment). Key files to update:
1. SKILL.md Phase 4 DSPy section (~lines 699-784) — replace "docstring IS the prompt" with "empty docstring + prompts/{agent}.md" pattern
2. frameworks/dspy/CHEATSHEET.md Rule 0 (~lines 36-160) — update to reference XML tags and separate .md files
3. Add DSPy file traversal path equivalent to the LangGraph sub-agent template
4. Update examples to use XML tags instead of === HEADER === format
5. Add the __doc__ runtime loading pattern code example

Reference the audit findings doc at AUDIT_FINDINGS.md for context on what went wrong.","assignedBy":"team-lead","timestamp":"2026-02-13T14:40:32.412Z"}

summary: Nudge to claim Task 1 and start work
